title: Madeleine McCann suspect Christian Brueckner ordered to face fresh court case
content: Reacting to the charges, Christian Brueckner's lawyer Philipp Marquort told the Mirror: 'Give me a break. Nobody else would have been accused in this way other than Mr Brueckner'

title: Krosno airport race horror as car crashes into crowd with at least 14 casualties
content: This is a breaking story and is being constantly updated. Please return to this page for the latest updates.

title: 'Drugs mule' Brits trapped in hellhole jails - why some do it and grim fates
content: Bella May Culley, 18, and Charlotte May Lee, 21, were arrested with a day of each other and face decades in foreign jails, but they are just two out of hundreds of British nationals languishing in foreign prisons on drugs offences

title: 'I've visited 130 countries - my favourite is unique and it's staggering beautiful'
content: BBC presenter Simon Reeve has opened up about his favourite country - and says it has 'staggeringly beautiful' landscapes and wildlife that can't be found 'anywhere else'

title: Prince Andrew accuser Virginia Giuffre funeral takes place in secret
content: Virginia Giuffre, who claimed to have been trafficked for sex with Prince Andrew by billionaire paedophile Jeffrey Epstein, was cremated in a funeral service held in Perth, Australia

title: Israel comes under attack as 'missile fired from Yemen' triggers response
content: Israeli authorities have confirmed that it has activated its defence systems after coming under attack from a missile launched at the country from Yemen as tensions boil over in the Middle East

title: Missing Pheobe Bishop case grips Australia as 9-day mystery of vanishing teen continues
content: Pheobe Bishop, 17, has been missing since May 15 but police have discovered new CCTV evidence and made a grim update in her case

title: Northland Shopping Centre UPDATES as MP slams area as 'rotten' amid machete horror
content: A teenager has been left with serious injuries after a 10-person brawl at Northland Shopping Centre, Preston, in the north of Melbourne, with the place put in lockdown

title: Brit held in Dubai 'hellhole' jail on drugs charges and unable to shower
content: Isabella Daggett, 21, from Leeds, is being held in a hellhole Dubai prison after being arrested on drugs charges and it is claimed she hasn't even been able to shower or change clothes

title: NATO scrambles warplanes as Putin's forces launch heaviest strikes in months
content: Evil Vladimir Putin launched a huge set of airstrikes across Ukraine in a deadly overnight blitz. Poland announced it had 'activated all available forces and resources' in the NATO nation

title: Mystery as loyal husband found dead in a fire but it isn't what killed him
content: Calculated ex-wife Melody Farris knew she was in line for $2 million so she turned her estranged husband into ash then proceeded to commit the ultimate parental betrayal - she blamed her son

title: Anyone who wants to look younger urged to have one drink for 30 days
content: The secret to looking younger than your actual age could be as simple as adding one thing to your usual drink

title: Russia and Ukraine swap hundreds more prisoners hours after a massive drone and missile attack on Kyiv
content: The latest prisoner of war swap came after Ukraine and Russia both reported drones over their capital cities - with Kyiv's residents warned of a tough night ahead

title: Three North Korean officials arrested after Kim Jong-Un's new warship sinks at launch
content: Three people have been arrested after a new warship intended to display the nation's military power spectacularly sank at its launch in front of dictator Kim Jong-un

title: Young girl, 8, fights for life after being hit by a car and found unconscious on the road
content: The young girl was found by officers unconscious on the road after being hit by a Holden SUV. She was treated by paramedics at the scene before being rushed to hopsital in a critical condition

title: Man dies after crane part falls from sky and lands on him in Gran Canaria street
content: It was around midday when the 40-year-old man was walking down a public street while construction materials were being unloaded for work on a residential building

title: Urgent search for Brit, 65, with Parkinson's missing in Paris for days
content: "Vulnerable" Chris Arnheim, 65, visited Paris to watch the French Open this week, but became separated from his brother

title: Tourist cheats death after homeless man randomly stabs her in back of neck
content: The female holidaymaker was knifed in the back of the neck in the horror attack as she strolled through the eastern Spanish city of Valencia with her boyfriend

title: Michael Gaine suspect 'revolted' by farmer's death after human remains found in slurry
content: Michael Kelley, who maintains his innocence in the Kenmare farmer's alleged murder, admitted he is heartbroken after dismembered remains were found in slurry on his land

title: Spanish airport imposes new 9pm to 5am rule which will apply to UK tourists
content: Madrid Airport is set to take drastic action to limit access to the airport between the hours of 9pm to 5am to ticket holders only, as the city faces an ongoing homeless problem

title: Expert reveals how women are getting so easily embroiled in drug smuggling offences
content: With three drug trafficking cases making headlines in the past few months alone, it appears this is becoming a significant issue. With this in mind, we chat with an expert on how Brits are mixing with cartels so easily

title: 'I visited strip Jay Slater partied at before he died - what I found disturbed me'
content: The Mirror's Patrick Hill, who spent nearly a month in Tenerife investigating the teenager's disappearance last summer, this week returned to the island after an inquest found Jay had taken a cocktail of Class-A drugs before he died

title: Man wakes up to find 10,000 tonne cargo ship crashed into garden
content: A 10,000 cargo ship crashed into Johan Helberg's home in Norway but the sound of the collision did not even wake him up - the huge vessel was metres away from destroying his house

title: Woman whose legs ripped off in horror boat propeller accident had SECOND family heartbreak
content: A tourist who was on her dream holiday had her legs ripped off by a boat propeller when she fell into the water - but it's not the first tragedy her family have faced

title: Charlotte May Lee blames new mystery man for Sri Lankan drug charges jail hell
content: Charlotte May Lee, 21, was stopped at an airport in Sri Lanka after arriving from Thailand, with authorities claiming she was carrying cannabis valued at more than Â£1m
